# Grid item



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

The Grid Items component is passed to a grid. It is used to create grid layouts.

Refer to the grid component page for an example of how to use grid items.

## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                               | Type                                                                                             | Default    |
| ------------ | ------------- | ----------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------- |
| `gridColumn` | `grid-column` | Defines the column size of the component. | `` `${number} / ${number}` \| `${number} / span ${number}` \| `${number}` \| `span ${number}` `` | `'span 1'` |
| `gridRow`    | `grid-row`    | Defines the row size of the component.    | `` `${number} / ${number}` \| `${number} / span ${number}` \| `${number}` \| `span ${number}` `` | `'span 1'` |


## Slots

| Slot | Description                      |
| ---- | -------------------------------- |
|      | Passes content to the Grid Item. |


----------------------------------------------
